I have been avoiding this, because i dislike ntr, but people keep reposting it, so i tried reading it. I thought I would be sad or angry at the end of this, but i'm just frustrated at the lack of quality. The art and quadrinization doesn't stand out, actually they're pretty underwhelming, Terasu art, is good and works, during the first readings, but after some time they lose their charm, and since his scenes are not that erotic, it ends up just being average, and sometimes straight up bad, like in the last story, the scenes are bland, and not that erotic, besides that, he's terrible in doing scenes with more than two characters, he's unable to give equal focus to the girls, and since he doesn't build them in personality or body, it ends up seeing like is the same girl all the time, with undermines the whole point of the group. The NTR element is terrible used, his talk about blackness is just cringe. I accept that other like it, but for me, is terrible in all aspects.
